mapper.select: SELECT TX_INTESTAZIONE as txIntestazione, TX_INDIRIZZO as txIndirizzo, TX_LOCALITA as txLocalita, TX_PROVINCIA as txProvincia, CD_CAP as cdCap, CD_FISC as cdFisc, CD_PIVA as cdPiva, CD_SIA as cdSia, CD_ABI as cdAbi, CD_CAB as cdCab, NR_CONTO as nrConto, NR_CIN as nrCin, NR_CCP as nrCCP, ID_SEDA as idSeda, CD_CHECK_DIGIT as checkDigit, CD_PAESE as cdPaese FROM ${database.schema}PARAMETRI_CONTRADA
